entry.title: Marriage of Convenience
entry.summary:
Author: after_avenging_hours

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,618Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 181

Summary: Jason Todd doesn't marry for love. That whole 'white-picket-fence' life was never in the cards for him. But he will marry you, so you can have access to his health insurance. He's certainly not using it, and he'd rather not have to deal with looking for a new roommate after you die from the infection you refuse to get treatment for. It's a marriage of convenience. No fuss. No complications... at least, until he starts falling in love with his wife.

entry.title: People Aren't Good
entry.summary:
Author: Miss_nightshade

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,699Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 10

Summary: Hecate has spent her life tucked into the bruised edges of Gotham’s Narrows, pretending to be a small, harmless girl with nothing worth noticing. It’s a fragile lie, but it holds. She goes to school. She walks home alone. She returns to a house that feels older than she is, a place that hums with magic she refuses to touch. She keeps her power buried. She ignores the ancient voices whispering inside her. She does everything she can to stay unseen. And for years, it works. Until the night it doesn’t.

entry.summary:
Author: lushescape

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,000Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 18

Summary: “C'mon, man. Can't we take a break? Mercy? Uncle?” You're all but pleading on the mat. entry.title: Mother of Exiles
entry.summary:
Author: scleraphone

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 58,123Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 196

Summary: Somewhere along the line, someone had told you that if you worked hard and honest, you could make a difference in people's lives. You moved to Gotham after college to help where help was needed. You knew it was a city that took time to understand, like familiarizing yourself with the cycles of a tide. What you didn't expect was how quickly you'd be pulled into the undertow.

entry.title: The Garden and the Gun
entry.summary:
Author: Knight_Ana

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,753Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 12

Summary: Gotham City — but not the high-rise chaos we usually see. The story focuses on a small, older neighborhood just outside Crime Alley. It’s rough around the edges but alive — full of community, old shops, and people trying to do good in a rotting city. (y/n) works in a flower shop run by an elderly couple who treat them like family. They also volunteer at a local community center, helping street kids and runaways — some of whom have been directly affected by Gotham’s gang wars.

entry.title: Death, before the beginning
entry.summary:
Author: undeadmythos

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 518Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 2

Summary: She’d stopped the Reapers. The citadel was destroyed. No rebuilding. In their last efforts to kill Shepard, in a big, blinding flash of light, they sent her elsewhere. Now, a hundred years in the past, in a different universe, with gods, heroes, villains, and a certain red-helmet wearing vigilante, Shepard navigates through the unfamiliar territory. The past catching up to her. Would they accept her if they knew the truth? What she was? What she’d done? FemShep x Jason Todd - more info in first chapter <3

entry.title: Baby’s First Creature-Feature
entry.summary:
Author: TheGoldenPath

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,608Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 11

Summary: She’s reading to him, a generator manual that looks well read. The pages are yellow and water stained around her long fingers. His vision lazily trails from the book to his bloodied sheets and back to the stranger. Is he hallucinating a comforting presence to make his reality less burdensome? When had his visions ever been pleasant?A pretty girl to sit by his bedside and comfort him in his death. It reminds him of the soft moments of peace in his childhood that he held onto with a white knuckled grip. It reminds him of the few moments his mother felt like a mother. He tries to reach out and touch her hand, just to see if she’s a fantasy meant to remind him of everything he never fully had only for the pain to jolt up his entire abdomen. That works too. He manages to stifle the pained groan that wants to shoot out from the simple motion.   Lightly inspired by the myth of Circe in the odyssey. (Lightly)

entry.title: Strangers in the Night
entry.summary:
Author: unnamedmystery

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 50,547Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 229

Summary: When the Daily Planet heard word of a new vigilante in Crime Alley that supposedly had no affiliation with Batman, Perry White thought it to be a nice short story—a quick in and out. After all, while the people of Metropolis had Superman, everyone knew of Batman, and a vigilante not working with him seemed interesting. At least, that’s what Perry told his college intern. And her mentor Clark Kent when he raised concerns. No one told her that the vigilante was intimidatingly attractive. Or that Crime Alley was the worse place in Gotham City. Or that her mentor would ask a friend to keep tabs on her. Or that the detective she’s staying with hates Batman despite working with him frequently. Or that the detectives neighbor was a really cute guy.
